alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 9:33PM EDT until August 24 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oakland County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 932 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grand Blanc, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Holly and Ortonville around 940 PM EDT. Clarkston around 1000 PM EDT. Milford around 1010 PM EDT. West Bloomfield around 1025 PM EDT. Novi around 1030 PM EDT. Northville around 1040 PM EDT. Southfield around 1045 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Lathrup Village, Auburn Hills and Bingham Farms. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
